title: How do I turn on or turn off the mobile data?
answer:
Use either of the following methods:

l Go to Settings > Wireless & networks > More > Mobile networks, and select or deselect Data enabled.

l [In the notification panel, touch ![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/3b49c_fa1xg.png) to enable the data service. When the data service is enabled, ![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/3b49d_qm7du.png) changes to ![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/3b49e_g3av4.png). To disable the data service, touch ![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/3b49f_phywj.png).]()
